alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Greeley; Hall; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 7:35PM CDT until April 28 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Greeley County in central Nebraska... Southwestern Nance County in central Nebraska... Northern Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... West central Merrick County in central Nebraska... Sherman County in central Nebraska... Howard County in central Nebraska... Northwestern Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 734 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Wolbach to near Elba to near Litchfield, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Litchfield around 740 PM CDT. St. Paul and Farwell around 745 PM CDT. Hazard around 750 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Cushing, Dannebrog, Pleasanton, Boelus, Cairo, Palmer and Archer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Greeley; Hall; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Sherman
